ProgSrvcAccomActyOtherGrp.Desc: INTERNATIONAL MINISTRIES 1,946,150 INTERNET TEACHING 1,091,125 UNALLOCATED HEALTH INSURANCE CREDIT 154,623

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: The audited combined financial statement contained the following: "There were no material uncertian tax positions for the years ended March 31, 2023 and 2022."
The endowment funds are held to provide resouces to assist RBC Ministries in carrying out its mission.
Form 990 is prepared by a CPA that is on staff and then reviewed by another staff member and a volunteer CPA.
Conflict of interest statements are signed each year by officers, board members and key employees and monitored for compliance.
The president's compensation is determined by the personnel committee of the board after a comparison of comp levels of similar organizations.
The HR department does a study on a regular basis of staff comp at various levels including key employees.
The conflict of interest policy and the financial statements are provided to anyone that requests them.
